titleStmt.title: A treatise concerning the lawfull subject of baptisme wherein are handled these particulars : the baptizing of infants confuted, ... the covenant God made with Abraham and his seed handled & how the same agrees with the Gentiles and their seed, the baptism administered by an Antichristian power confuted ... / by me, J.S.
titleStmt.author: J. S. (John Spilsbery)

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
